content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I am feeling like a fraud at work, doubting my accomplishments, and having a persistent fear of being exposed as incompetent.

I see. It can be hard to feel heard and heard when you are talking, especially at work. Does this sound to you like anything that might be going on at work? I understand how stressful it can feel at work, especially during this pandemic.
It really distracts me from focusing on the real challenge in my work.

I can definitely relate to that. I have been in the same situation myself. It seems like everything we do in the world is so important right now. It' s great that you have a way to look at the problem from a different perspective. Have you talked to your manager about how you are feeling? Often times, employees who have experienced this can offer suggestions to make things more successful for them. Sometimes, having more input is what helps me the most.
